extensionDescription.message: Prevent permanent damage to your eyes while browsing the web with this tool.

descriptionTempDisabled.message: Allows you to temporarily disable all reminders until you restart Firefox. Running this mode for extended periods of time may leave you vulnerable to permanent eye damage.

descriptionScheduleEnabled.message: When active, quiet time can be configured to prevent the activity from appearing during the selected times. For example, quiet time can be set to avoid seeing the activity while you are working.

errorNotificationRequiredPermission.message: Using this notification mode requires additional permission

errorPermissionStillMissing.message: The permission has still not been granted. Please try again.

descriptionPermissionMissing.message: The $EXTENSIONNAME$ add-on requires permission to create browser notifications. Please grant this permission or change your the add-on options to use a different notification mode.

descriptionActivityIntro.message: Staring at your computer screen for long periods of time can strain your eyes and lead to permanent vision damage. This is why it's important to give your eyes a break. For every 20 minutes, you should focus on something at least 20 feet away for 20 seconds.

descriptionActivityIntroAction.message: Press the start button and look away. Your computer will chime and the screen will flash when the 20 seconds is up.

descriptionRisks.message: Continuous exposure to your computer screen can cause irreversible damage to your eyes. It's highly recommended that you take a break.

descriptionActivityInstructions.message: Look at something at least 20 feet away until the timer stops

descriptionActivityFinished.message: You may now continue your browsing session by clicking the "$BUTTON$" button

headingClosePage.message: You can now close this page

delayedNotificationMessage.message: Once you have wrapped up your work and are ready to take a break, click this notification...

notificationTitle1.message: It's time to protect your eyes!

notificationTitle4.message: Do you have 20 seconds to spare?

notificationMessage1.message: You've been looking at your screen for a long time. Let's give your eyes a break.

notificationMessage2.message: You are reading this message thanks to your eyes. Show them some appreciation by doing this short exercise to prevent digital eye strain.

notificationMessage3.message: You look like you're being really productive right now. Let's take a short break to protect your eyes.

notificationMessage4.message: Let's make sure your eyes stay top-notch. It only takes 20 seconds of your time.

notificationMessage5.message: Staring at your computer screen for long periods of time can lead to permanent damage. Let's prevent that with a short activity.

errorStartTimeAfterEndTime.message: End time must be after start time
